The Museum of Contemporary Art (MoCA) in Los Angeles has appointed Leslie Quinn as its next executive director. Quinn succeeds Susanne Vielmetter, who retired in February 2019 after eighteen years at the helm of the museum. Quinn was previously director of the Los Angeles County Museum of Art (LACMA), where she oversaw the renovation and expansion of the institution from 2004 to 2009.
